languages.text: {n}Мышцы сводит в неистовой агонии — вам кажется, что вы слышите скрежет костей и вопли натянутых сухожилий. Наградой за страдания становится неуклюжий поворот набок, после чего силы вновь покидают вас.{/n}

{n}Your muscles cramp in bitter agony — you could swear you hear the gnashing of bones and the wailing of stretched tendons. The reward for your suffering is a clumsy turn to one side, and then, your strength leaves you once more.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мышцы сводит в неистовой агонии — вам кажется, что вы слышите скрежет костей и вопли натянутых сухожилий. Наградой за страдания становится неуклюжий поворот набок, после чего силы вновь покидают вас.{/n}

{n}Your muscles cramp in bitter agony — you could swear you hear the gnashing of bones and the wailing of stretched tendons. The reward for your suffering is a clumsy turn to one side, and then, your strength leaves you once more.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的肌肉在剧烈的疼痛中痉挛，你清楚地听到了骨骼的咬合声与筋腱拉伸时的哀嚎声。你承受了这种程度的痛苦，却仅能将身体笨拙地转向一旁，随后，身体中的力量再次离你而去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your muscles cramp in bitter agony — you could swear you hear the gnashing of bones and the wailing of stretched tendons. The reward for your suffering is a clumsy turn to one side, and then, your strength leaves you once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的肌肉在剧烈的疼痛中痉挛，你清楚地听到了骨骼的咬合声与筋腱拉伸时的哀嚎声。你承受了这种程度的痛苦，却仅能将身体笨拙地转向一旁，随后，身体中的力量再次离你而去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus músculos se contraen en una dolorosa agonía; jurarías que has oído el rechinar de los huesos y el quejido de los tendones al estirarse. La recompensa por tu sufrimiento es un torpe bamboleo a un lado, y luego las fuerzas vuelven a abandonarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your muscles cramp in bitter agony — you could swear you hear the gnashing of bones and the wailing of stretched tendons. The reward for your suffering is a clumsy turn to one side, and then, your strength leaves you once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus músculos se contraen en una dolorosa agonía; jurarías que has oído el rechinar de los huesos y el quejido de los tendones al estirarse. La recompensa por tu sufrimiento es un torpe bamboleo a un lado, y luego las fuerzas vuelven a abandonarte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kasların acı bir ıstırapla kasılıyor. Kemiklerin gıcırtısını ve gerilmiş tendonların iniltisini duyduğuna yemin edebilirsin. Istırabının ödülü, bir tarafa doğru beceriksizce dönmek oluyor. Sonrasında gücün seni bir kez daha terk ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your muscles cramp in bitter agony — you could swear you hear the gnashing of bones and the wailing of stretched tendons. The reward for your suffering is a clumsy turn to one side, and then, your strength leaves you once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kasların acı bir ıstırapla kasılıyor. Kemiklerin gıcırtısını ve gerilmiş tendonların iniltisini duyduğuna yemin edebilirsin. Istırabının ödülü, bir tarafa doğru beceriksizce dönmek oluyor. Sonrasında gücün seni bir kez daha terk ediyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの筋肉は激しい苦痛でけいれんする―骨の軋む音や伸びきった腱の悲鳴が聞こえると誓うことができた。苦しみの報酬は、ぎこちない寝返りであり、そのたびにもう一度力が抜ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your muscles cramp in bitter agony — you could swear you hear the gnashing of bones and the wailing of stretched tendons. The reward for your suffering is a clumsy turn to one side, and then, your strength leaves you once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの筋肉は激しい苦痛でけいれんする―骨の軋む音や伸びきった腱の悲鳴が聞こえると誓うことができた。苦しみの報酬は、ぎこちない寝返りであり、そのたびにもう一度力が抜ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos muscles se contractent avec force protestation, au point que vous pourriez jurer avoir entendu le grincement des os et la plainte des tendons qu'on étire. Toutes ces souffrances pour parvenir à vous tourner maladroitement sur un côté avant que vos forces ne vous abandonnent à nouveau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your muscles cramp in bitter agony — you could swear you hear the gnashing of bones and the wailing of stretched tendons. The reward for your suffering is a clumsy turn to one side, and then, your strength leaves you once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos muscles se contractent avec force protestation, au point que vous pourriez jurer avoir entendu le grincement des os et la plainte des tendons qu'on étire. Toutes ces souffrances pour parvenir à vous tourner maladroitement sur un côté avant que vos forces ne vous abandonnent à nouveau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Muskeln verkrampfen sich schmerzhaft. Du könntest schwören, dass du das Knirschen von Knochen und das Klagen überdehnter Sehnen hörst. Die Belohnung für dein Leid ist eine unbeholfene Drehung auf eine Seite, ehe dich deine Stärke wieder verlässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your muscles cramp in bitter agony — you could swear you hear the gnashing of bones and the wailing of stretched tendons. The reward for your suffering is a clumsy turn to one side, and then, your strength leaves you once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Muskeln verkrampfen sich schmerzhaft. Du könntest schwören, dass du das Knirschen von Knochen und das Klagen überdehnter Sehnen hörst. Die Belohnung für dein Leid ist eine unbeholfene Drehung auf eine Seite, ehe dich deine Stärke wieder verlässt.{/n}
